message: I propose a 50/50 split. Let's share the wealth equally.
I'll give you a generous 30% if you accept now
I think a 60/40 split is fairer than 50/50. I'm willing to give you more than half of the money.
I'll give you a small share, but I want most of the money now
I believe a 45/55 split is reasonable. It gives you a substantial amount while also providing me with a decent portion.
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the majority of the money now
I think a 35/65 split is fair. It's a balanced approach where both of us get a significant portion of the money.
